dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Oh, what's that? Sorry, I'm afraid my hearing isn't what it used to be.
You know, back in my days I used to be an adventurer like you... I traveled across the land, learned many of the different trades, visited all the brothels on the way... ah, a time long past.
I still remember some of the more basic spells though... If you like, I can teach them to you.
